view.description:
Properties to return. The pattern is like:?view=(:view-name)?(,column)*. (:view-name) and (,columns)* must be mutually exclusive names of predefined views start with colon (':'). The following view-name are defined: :all :default

If no view-name is specified, names of properties or predefined views should be returned, separated by comma (',').

links.description: Ensures whether link relations to be returned for this object representation. * 'true', return links for the object. * 'false' do not return links for the object.

use-content.description: Allows user to specify whether to use the content while running the method. If the parameter is set to true, it updates the use_method_content parameter of the method
